about: This is a demo file showcasing the help function and all different types of fields.

field_types.string_required: This is a required field. You can't leave this blank
field_types.illegal_field: This field is not defined by the schema. Type :f to remove it.
field_types.invalid_field: This field is defined in the schema, but has an invalid value.

lists.about: Every data type can also be defined as a list. The same options (min, max, etc.) apply to lists as well.
